page.title: 08Recreation in the area
page.content:
At{Misterton County Primary},there is a small covered heated swimming pool.It is reserved for schools use during the day but may be hired by clubs or individuals at all other times .Bookings through the Area Education Office, Retford 702681. {Pool built with funds from 8 villages
A small private{Nature Reserve}is situated at Soss Lane,Misterton and is owned by Mr & Mrs Coles.There is approximately 2/3 acres of land, with a small lake where several species of game birds and wildfowl may be viewed. There is an abundance of wild life ,e.g. Kingfisher,Heron,etc.Visits contact Mr & Mrs Coles.
There is a small{Health Club}at Misterton,where it is possible to do weight training,sauna and solarium.
